newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: FIGURE SKATING-FASSI'S WIDOW ACCOMPANIES SKATER.
newsitem.headline: FIGURE SKATING-FASSI'S WIDOW ACCOMPANIES SKATER.

text.p: Christa Fassi, faithful to one of her husband's last requests, accompanied American Nicole Bobek at the short programme in the world figure skating championships on Friday.
Carlo Fassi, Christa's husband and Bobek's coach, died of a heart attack on Thursday, eve of the women's event.
"One of his last words was asking Christa to be with me during the competition," Bobek said.
Bobek's performance seemed to be affected by the bereavement.
